mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia State Firemen's Association Memorandum and Arlington County Firemen's Association Memorandum, February 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: VA State Firemen's Association 2/1954 memorandums, the first having an attachment to a set of constitution changes, and the second one having an attachment to a bill being proposed to Virginia's House of Delegates.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
